title: Pina colada roulade
description: The tropical flavours of pineapple, rum and coconut make this roulade a real treat for grown-ups with a sweet tooth.For this recipe you will need a 33x22cm/13x8½in Swiss roll tin, a food processor, a freestanding mixer or handheld whisk, a griddle pan and a piping bag fitted with a large closed star nozzle.
ingredients: 140g/5oz icing sugar, plus extra for dusting
½ tsp coconut extract paste (or 1 tsp coconut extract)
2 small pineapples, peeled, cored and cut into rings
½ tsp coconut extract paste (or 1 tsp coconut extract)
